column3: Naghdeh and Nagadeh (formerly known as Sulduz; also Romanized as Sulduz
column5: is a town in and the township centre of Naqadeh County

column2: there were 598 Assyrians in 108 families at Sulduz; 35 were elderly
Arianne (2010). Familiar Faces in Unfamiliar Places: Assyrians in the California Heartland 1911 - 2010.
